task.title: Troubleshooting
task.shortdesc: Fix common issues in ordering flow and receipt output.

section.title: Receipt prints “You did not order anything”
section.p: Cause: you quit at the initial prompt (no pizzas were added).
Fix: answer y/yes at the first prompt, complete at least one pizza, then quit.

section.title: “Invalid topping” appears even when a topping looks correct
section.p: Cause: the topping must match the supported set (spelling matters).
Fix: type LIST to view valid toppings, then copy one exactly.

section.title: Total seems incorrect for 4+ toppings
section.p: Cause: only the first 3 toppings are included; toppings beyond 3 are charged per extra topping based on size.
Fix: verify extra topping lines and per-size rates in the pricing reference.

section.title: Tax has more than two decimals
section.p: Cause: tax must be rounded to two decimals before adding to the total.
Fix: round tax to 2 decimals and print values with two-decimal formatting.
